Config.ShowDebugMessagesDesc: Output debug logs to SMAPI Console to help bugfinding.
Config.HideMiniFridgesDesc: Hide mini-fridges outside of the map each morning.
Config.NextFridgeTabButtonDesc: Button to navigate to next tab.
Config.LastFridgeTabButtonDesc: Button to navigate to previous tab.

Debug.HideMiniFridgeDisabled: Mini-fridges are set to remain visible.
